channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-36104|2024-06-04T07:25:07.746Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20ofbiz
item.description:
Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Apache OFBiz. This issue affects Apache OFBiz: before 18.12.14.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 18.12.14, which fixes the issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-25141|2024-02-20T20:30:28.924Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20airflow%20mongo%20provider
item.description: When ssl was enabled for Mongo Hook, default settings included "allow_insecure" which caused that certificates were not validated. This was unexpected and undocumented. Users are recommended to upgrade to version 4.0.0, which fixes this issue.
